summary.span: 包含表示组合引擎核心功能的类，其中包括组合操作、协定、部件依赖关系、导出说明，以及管理部件公开方式的生存期上下文。

span.span: Contains classes that represent core functionality of the composition engine, including composition operations, contracts, part dependencies, export descriptions, and the lifetime context of a shared part that governs how it can be disposed.
